Description:
Location, Location, Location - With Views to Match!
Located just a few hundred metres from Woolworths and Emerald Village and with gorgeous views of the hills and valleys beyond, this attractive family home is going to be popular!
The home sits privately behind its paling fence with a fern filled landscaped garden, paved driveway and double carport. Offering 3 bedrooms with built in robes, the spacious Master also includes an ensuite. The good sized open plan kitchen and dining includes a cosy wood fire heater perfect for those cooler days. An impressive wide hallway leads to the large living room and study/4th bedroom. The full sized windows in this living area provide stunning views of the Grampian ranges and a sliding door provides access to the rear elevated balcony.
Relax on the east facing balcony taking in the wonderful views while overlooking the fully fenced and well maintained rear garden with usable flat lawn, perfect for the kids or your fury friends to play in safety. Features of the home include ducted vacuum system, hydronic heating and split system cooling for year round comfort.
This home is spacious and comfortable with an unbeatable location, book your private inspection today before it's gone!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820
Please note: All property details shown are correct at time of publishing. Some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours and we recommend that you confirm open for inspection times with the listing agent direct or the listing office

Description:
Nature Lovers
Set on the hill above the trees, sits this lovely 3-bedroom home on the doorstep of Wrights Forest in Emerald.
The split-level design has an open plan kitchen and dining, lovely lounge room that opens out onto the fabulous veranda where you can sit and enjoy the abundance of bird life. Extra features include wood fire heater, shedding, chicken coup, under house storage, easy access with new concrete drive and ample off-street parking.
Set on over 1/3rd acre, you will love living with the local echidnas, wallabies, wombats, king parrots, rosellas, kookaburras and more.
Walking tracks are on your doorstep as well as the charm of Puffing Billy going by.
Be quick to inspect

Description:
QUIET COUNTRY LIVING, YET CLOSE TO TOWN AND IMMACULATE IN EVERY WAY
Genuine sellers.
Welcome to your new home.
This spacious ranch style home with long front verandah is sure to tug at the heart strings, with a park like front lawn and shaded by a stunning Japanese maple you can listen to the bird song and enjoy coming home.
Spoilt for choice in a home that seamlessly combines both indoor and outdoor living, these versatile spaces will invite both the young and older, singles and families. Inside showcases expansive living areas, a lounge with vaulted ceiling and fireplace, open plan central living area with spacious on trend kitchen, dining area and casual lounge with wood fire and also a study/4th bedroom. The family bathroom with soaking tub and separate shower services the 2 double bedrooms with wall to wall carpets and built in robes. The fabulous master bedroom offers a lavish ensuite with double shower, vanity and walk in robe.
Venture outdoors and see, a great tiered allotment with an ornamental river bed running through to a water feature, a cubby with super slide, veggie patch, covered eatery with restful places to unwind the stresses of the day and the yard is fully fenced for four legged family members too.
To complete an already fabulous property the sealed driveway accesses a workshop, double garage, shedding and storage.
This has to be located in one of the premium locations in Emerald, on a quiet sealed no-though road, surrounded by lovely homes and walking distance to all that Emerald has on offer with cafes, Primary and Secondary School and shops.
Contact Mick Dolphin on 0429 684522 or Janet Hawkins on 0409 117 432 to arrange your inspection today or if you would like more information.

Description:
Exquisite Home on Private ½ Acre - Walk to Everything!
This stunning and stylish mud brick home, situated on a private 1/2 acre block, will give you a sense of comfort and peace the moment you drive in. The sweeping bitumen driveway and landscaped gardens guide you to the double lock up garage and spectacular entry.
You will be impressed by the quality features that are found throughout including soaring high cathedral ceilings, open living spaces & large windows that allow plenty of natural light to bath the home while providing wonderful views of the greenery that surrounds. This home oozes unique character with the mud brick feature walls, exposed timbers and quality lighting.
Comprising of four bedrooms with the spacious Master featuring a full ensuite and walk in robe. Two separate living areas provide further space for a growing family. The formal lounge and dining room include glass door access to the back entertaining area which is covered providing the perfect place to relax with friends and family all year round.
The exquisite Blackwood kitchen which will delight the cooks in the family with its eye catching granite bench tops, timber cabinetry and quality stainless steel appliances, seamlessly connects with the large family room complete with the cosy wood fire heater for the cooler months.
Other features include an exceptionally large laundry, reverse cycle split system and polished Blackwood floors.
Outdoors you have driveway access to the rear of the property, landscaped low maintenance gardens, double garage/workshop, separate large powered workshop, fully fenced, 5kw solar, 2 water storage tanks, gutter guards and fully flood lit.
This impressive property is just a short distance to Emerald Secondary College, Avonsleigh store, public transport and Emerald township. A remarkable property that must be viewed.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Samantha Scott 0438 680 032

Description:
Lovely Linden Steps from Town
This elegant home offers exceptional family living only a short stroll from schools, shops, parkland, and transport. Displaying a successful coupling of traditional architecture and modern comforts, this is a beautiful residence in a revered neighbourhood.
Framed by landscaped, low-maintenance gardens with privacy hedging, terraced lawn, and cubby house for the kids, this is a picture-perfect backdrop for this forever home. Introduced by the double garage with workshop and in-house access, and an inviting wrap-around veranda, this home is a stand-out on this quiet, leafy street.
The stylish interior rich with quality finishes capitalises on comfort and clever design. The central corridor with polished floorboards and high ceilings leads to the beautiful main bedroom with ensuite and WIR, family-size laundry with walk-in storage, and expansive formal lounge awash with garden views. At its heart, this home offers an open plan design with a quality kitchen with island bench seating and walk-in pantry, spacious dining area, and family room with gas fire and doors to the covered deck. Filled with natural light and treetop views of Gembrook Park, this space is certain to invite entertaining for years to come.
With additional bedrooms positioned with the dual sink family bath, an abundance of storage, and creature comforts including ducted heating, Linden is a lovely home for a lifetime of enjoyment. Inspection will impress.

Description:
Tranquility Amongst the Tree Ferns!
Located in a quiet and leafy cul de sac in Avonsleigh, youll feel relaxed and right at home as soon as you drive in. With majestic gums and feature tree ferns in abundance, gentle tranquility will welcome you to this 3 bedroom brick home situated on over just half an acre.
The entry hall opens to the comfortable family room and dining area where wall to wall glass stacker-doors allow not only natural light to filter in but opens up the room to integrate the outdoor covered entertaining deck with this living area.
The Master bedroom connects from this family room and offers a large walk in robe, ensuite and its own external access onto the deck through a glass sliding door. The well-appointed kitchen with its ample bench space, dishwasher and large pantry connects with the meals area and provides the ideal place for families to spend quality time together at mealtime. The other two bedrooms have double robes and are zoned away from the Master near the newly renovated family bathroom. The gas ducted heating and box air conditioner will ensure your comfort throughout the year and fresh new carpets will ensure a luxury feel underfoot.
Outside there is a double carport and a spacious storage area under the house. With a garden full of mature tree ferns, youll enjoy meandering along the pathways enjoying the tranquility this property has to offer.
This unique home is a must see.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820

Description:
PERFECTLY PRESENTED CENTRALLY LOCATED UNIT
Situated in the heart of town within walking distance of everything that the wonderful township of Emerald has to offer is this beautiful, updated unit that is perfect for those looking to downsize and those wanting low maintenance living with every convenience. The home comprises of 2 bedrooms with built in robes, great sized modern kitchen with gas stove, plenty of cupboards and bench space, an adjoining meals area, updated bathroom with oversized shower and a generous lounge room. Special features include split system heating and cooling and large windows that allow plenty of natural light to flow through. Outside offers a double tandem garage and a covered outdoor area that is the ideal place to sit back and unwind. Properties of this calibre are hard to find, so call today as an inspection is a must!
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
Panoramic views and so close to town!
When Albert Le Souef first settled in Gembrook in 1873 he knew then that this location was something special and when you come to this residence, in a street named after him you are sure to see why.
North facing aspect with rural views, cows mooing, Puffing Billy tooting and the quaint township of Gembrook just a short stroll away. This is quintessential country living!
Meticulously presented and beautifully maintained, this mud brick home is bright and airy with large expanses of glass to capture beautiful natural light.
Deliciously different by architect design, a versatile and open plan layout awaits, the elevated main suite is breathtaking with WIR, full ensuite, sitting area, and balcony. If superb views arent your thing, you may like relaxing in the 10 seater spa or take in a movie in the theatre room.
On just over a 1/3 of an acre, this property also boasts 3 further bedrooms, a family bathroom with claw foot bath, separate powder room, spacious lounge, glass-roofed dining room, contemporary kitchen with quality appliances, a huge laundry, front and rear deck, double garage with remote door, split systems, ducted heating, sealed drive and road, wood heater, fenced rear yard.
Everyone needs some mud brick magic in their lives and you really need to come to 19 Le Souef Road in Gembrook to see how perfect this home may be for you. Ideally located with laneway to walk into the main street, yet near the end of a quiet street, you are only minutes to shops and cafes, the bus and Primary School. Dont delay for this home be quick!
Contact Mick Dolphin on 0429 684522, or Janet Hawkins on 0409 117 432 to arrange your inspection now!

Description:
A PICTURE PERFECT 4003m2 PARADISE CENTRAL GEMBROOK
Situated in a quiet, sealed road and just a short walk to the vibrant Gembrook Village shops and cafés is this gorgeous four bedroom home set on a fully fenced and beautifully landscaped block of almost one acre. Established trees give privacy and hide the size of the home. There are 3 huge living zones that take up the full length of the home offering a variety of entertaining and living options. At the front of the home the formal living area would be perfect for parents to relax and watch the latest release whilst at the other end of the home is a rumpus room that could play host to the childrens requirements for their own space. The central timber kitchen has stainless steel appliances including gas hotplates and dishwasher and a sunny meals area adjoining with doors that lead out to the paved outdoor area. Large picture windows to all living areas offer beautiful views of the surrounding gardens. The master bedroom has a full ensuite and walk in robe and is set away from the remaining bedrooms, all of which have built in robes. With zoned bedrooms providing privacy for the family, whatever the age of your children, this home will cater to your needs. Gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling and a welcoming gas log fire in the family room ensure year round comfort. Outdoors your very own botanical garden has room for a serious game of footy or cricket and double gates on both sides that provide access for additional vehicles. Direct access into the house from the double remote garage gives all weather access and ease of use. Providing everything a growing family could want and just a short walk to the Primary School, kindergarten, child care centre and shops, this is a property that you will be proud to call home.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.
Insights: 10 Gembrook Park Road, Gembrook VIC 3783 was last sold in 2019 and 20 other 4 bedroom house in Gembrook have recently been sold.

Description:
HIGH END LIVING IN CENTRAL EMERALD WITH INCOME OPPORTUNITY
Boasting a high class modern renovation, this stylish home offers the most functional and versatile floor plan that caters to a busy family and offers the opportunity for a work from home business or extended family situation. Situated in the centre of town, your ability to generate an income whilst enjoying the beauty that surrounds will be a great advantage to you and your bank balance. The central kitchen features Caesarstone benches, high gloss cabinetry, glass splashback, stainless steel appliances including a 900mm stove, dual drawer dishwasher and adjoins the family/meals area that has café doors leading out to the covered outdoor area creating the ideal indoor/outdoor living space for relaxed entertaining. The lounge room is a wonderful place to settle back with a good book and a glass of the best in front of an open fire and enjoy the view on offer. There are four bedrooms, the master with full ensuite. Both bathrooms have State of the Art fittings and fixtures including Caesarstone benches, floor to ceiling tiles, frameless showers and raised vanities. The main bathroom also benefits from a luxurious freestanding bath. Downstairs is currently set up as a work from home business and could easily be used as a teenagers pad or extended family accommodation. Luxury extras include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, hard wired USB ports and two instant hot water services. Set in the middle of Emerald on over 1600m2, with sealed driveway, established gardens, made road access and within walking distance of our kindergarten, Primary School, child care and shopping centre, this is the ideal property for those looking for country living with city convenience.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
HIGH QUALITY CLINKER BRICK PERIOD HOME ON OVER AN ACRE
Set on over an acre and nestled in the heart of Emeralds leafy surrounds, this clinker brick, Period style home is built to an extremely high standard. From the moment you open the 130 year old front door youre stepping into yesteryear. Genuine antique double doors, internal leadlight window, ceiling rose and feature plaster works greet you in the entrance hall. High ceilings, decorative cornices, skirting boards and high solid timber panelled doors continue throughout the house. The Jarrah kitchen with double oven, 5 burner Blanco hotplate (both 2 years old) dishwasher and even a slide down door to cover that microwave above the oven which didnt exist in the era this home is built to replicate. The Jarrah period style panelled doors designed for the kitchen flow through to both family bathrooms and the Master bedrooms full ensuite vanities is in identical style. The master bedroom also has a private door out to the back balcony, great for those Sunday brunches and for discreet access for the parents to walk privately to and from their bedroom to the external in ground spa and unique sauna. The sauna is another piece of genuine and irreplaceable memorabilia; built for the 2000 Olympics and purchased when the games were over, it is almost a one-of-a-kind. Take your dog for a run in the Emerald Lake Park (an easy, swift walking distance from this property), and then hop into the built-for-Olympians sauna at the end of the day with a glass of wine in the heated in-ground spa. This could be a regular activity to increase your fitness if you want to feel like a genuine athlete in the Olympians sauna.
The master bedrooms full ensuite has a 1 ½ sized shower while the family bathroom which services the other 3 bedrooms has a spa bath and full height Jarrah cupboards on either side of the vanity for all your storage needs.
The double garage has internal access to the meals/kitchen area making life a breeze when you bring in the shopping. Two of the childrens rooms are double sized and both of those, together with the master bedroom have full height built in robes that come complete with shelving, double hanging and storage. The fourth bedroom is currently used as a study and has views to the established Rhododendrons and landscaped gardens and is larger than your modern single bedrooms, with the addition of a simple Ikea or Bunnings robe will easily become a generous fourth bedroom.
The spacious living areas provide all the room a growing family could want and includes a large formal lounge with bay windows and formal dining room both with ceiling roses and decorative light fittings to match the entry hall. A separate and generous sized meals area leads you down two steps into the huge 6mx4m family/rumpus room with double doors that open to the back porch which overlooks the completely usable back yard which in its self would be about half an acre (half of the one acre property). The porch is the perfect place to sit with your favourite drink, enjoy the abundance of birdlife that only the Hills can offer and listen to Puffing Billy chugging along in the distant background while watching the children play hide and seek amongst the gum trees or kick the footy around.
Your comfort is assured with gas ducted heating, 2 split systems which can be used as either cooling or alternate heating of that vast family/rumpus room, meals and kitchen areas and you could make the feature fireplace, which is complete with wood boxes, solid timber mantle and a chimney a wood fire as it was originally designed and built for by installing a solid fuel fire. Easily done if you love to sit in front of a real flame, everything is in place to accommodate one.
All of this is surrounded by a blue stone entry, circular driveway, bluestone and brick garden retaining walls, a garden shed, under house storage area, landscaped gardens including 17 mature Rhododendrons, brick paved outdoor entertaining area, water feature, leafy shade trees and of course those century old, elegant gum trees.
And while the double brick garage provides protected and lockable parking for 2 cars, the circular drive and other gravelled areas will ensure there is plenty of onsite parking on the property for several extra cars for friends, family and visitors.
Walking distance to the Secondary College, bus stop, local café and just minutes drive to Emerald central; this is living.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.
Insights: 6 Lawsons Road, Emerald VIC 3782 was last sold in 2019 and 29 other 4 bedroom house in Emerald have recently been sold.

Description:
IT'S NOT JUST A LIVING SPACE, IT'S A HEALTHY PLACE
Perfectly positioned in highly-sought after Station Road precinct with spectacular northern views over Warburton ranges and just short walk to Gembrook Village, this quality eco-house has been designed and built with the utmost attention-to-detail.
Wonderfully suited to home based business such as small group therapy, retreat, health professional, bed and breakfast or swim teacher. Accommodation space supports the 3R's - relax, refresh, revive.
With a picturesque outlook from every window and overlooking a Phillip Johnson designed garden this home boasts a highly functional layout that offers a range of flexible spaces
Beautiful light-filled kitchen and dining room connected to open plan living and study
Oversized master-retreat with large ensuite and private courtyard
Second living zone with kitchenette and private courtyard which is self-contained and is currently operating as very successful bed & breakfast - Gembrook's Signal Box
Indoor heated pool connected to central entertaining area / gym space
Flexibility to create two additional bedrooms to create luxury four-bedroom family home
This beautiful residence combines quality craftsmanship and the use of natural materials and premium inclusions
Masterful rammed earth walls
Recycled hardwood timber throughout
Polished concrete exposed quartz floors
Double glazed windows
40,000 litre capacity water tanks
Solar power (17 panels)
Hydronic and wood fired heating
Gembrook has recently transformed into the prized jewel of the Dandenong ranges with renowned eateries including the acclaimed restaurant The Independent being key drivers behind strong population growth.
DONT MISS OUT A HOME OF THIS QUALITY IN THIS BLUE CHIP POSITION OF THIS THRIVING TOWN WILL NOT LAST LONG BOOK YOUR PRIVATE VIEWING TODAY!
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
TWO-STOREY TREEHOUSE
Home is here. Set on a gently sloping block, in a tightly held community-minded neighbourhood, on a peaceful no-thru road, prepare to be embraced as soon as you open the front door. With a comfy, log-cabin feel, youll be looking forward to winter so you can snuggle up in front of the brand new wood heater. In fact, you will have year-round comfort with a new split system, new gas ducted heating, and ceiling fans throughout.
On the ground level you will find a spacious kitchen with gas cooktop and dishwasher, meals area, living/dining area with skylights and a bar neatly tucked under the staircase, main bedroom with robe and 2nd bedroom with storage, laundry, main bathroom. Upstairs, there are two further bedrooms with robes, and a second living space all with tree-top views and a balcony looking towards Cardinia reservoir.
Outside, there is plenty of space for vehicles. The fully fenced property is protected by a new front fence and gate welcoming you into the double carport. Further towards the rear of the property there is a 2 to 4 car garage, a chook pen and 2 storage sheds. There is also under-house storage, and for those with furry friends, a cat run.
For the keen walker, both Emerald township and Emerald Lake Park are within reach.
Properties in this location and price range dont last long, so dont miss the opportunity to come and inspect.
Insights: 31 Hamilton Road, Emerald VIC 3782 was last sold in 2019 and 29 other 4 bedroom house in Emerald have recently been sold.

Description:
For Lovers of Character, Banool
The Dandenong Ranges has always been a tourist mecca and in the early 1900s it was no exception. Day trippers and holiday makers used to catch the steam train and head to the hills for relaxation, picnics and frivolity.
If only walls could talk, 1 Ogilvy Road in Emerald would have many a tale to tell. Formally Banool Tea Gardens this gorgeous slice of hills history is available now for you to create your own memories in.
Charming and welcoming this residence retains many of its period features and also some new creature comforts. Look around and see high ceilings, hardwood floors, open fireplace, quaint front porch, French doors, strapping and fretwork. Lovers of character will love the quirky layout and creative cabinetry.
Offering 4 bedrooms, a study, formal dining, lounge with open fire, spacious kitchen and adjoining meals, a sitting room where our owner loves to sit and read a book or listen to music overlooking the yard, spacious deck with spa, attic retreat, family bathroom, carport, storage and dual driveways.
Set on just over 2000 m2 of pretty established gardens, make sure the history buff in you is satisfied and the home buyer in you too. Banool awaits
Call Mick Dolphin on 0429 684 522, Janet Hawkins on 0409 117 432 to arrange your inspection now.
consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Please note: All property details listed were current at the time of publishing. Due to extreme buyer demand, some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours. Therefore confirmation of all opens with the listing agent within 24 hours of their scheduled opening is advised.

Description:
A TRANQUIL SETTING OF 2060m2 WITH VIEWS
High set to take advantage of the view to distant hills is this light filled brick home that has been lovingly kept and updated. Featuring large windows that allow natural light to drench the home and hardwood polished floor boards that add to a wonderful atmosphere, this is a home that offers classic charm and modern elegance. The living area is the perfect place to take in all that surrounds and has a sliding door out to the balcony, the ideal place for alfresco dining. The updated kitchen blends the best of modern style with the beauty of rich timber creating an inspiring setting for the chef. Stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher will make whipping up a masterpiece a delight and glass splashbacks provides a streamlined, easy care look. There is a meals/family area adjoining the kitchen where you can enjoy the scenery and leafy surrounds whilst relaxing around the dinner table. There are three bedrooms with built in robes and an updated bathroom that showcases a luxurious freestanding bath and raised vanity as well. Ducted heating, spilt system and ceiling fans ensure year round comfort. Situated on a leafy ½ acre setting with sealed road access, here is the ideal country property where city chic meets the best of country living.
Due to strong market conditions please call to confirm open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
DEVELOP (STCA) OR BUILD YOUR DREAM HOME
Located within in easy walking distance to the beautiful and expanding town of Gembrook is this very unique property. The original home is nicely elevated and positioned to the rear of the block, with magnificent distant views across Station Road, to the surrounding rolling hills. Set on a stunning allotment of 1228m2, boasting three road frontages with the potential for subdivision (subject to council approval), or building your new dream home. The property features an array of mature deciduous trees and overlooks the iconic Puffing Billy railway line. An opportunity too good to miss!!

Description:
Dual Zone Living with 4 Bedrooms!
Just a short distance to Emerald & Monbulk townships, this much loved family home has been beautifully maintained and offers both comfort and convenience. The fern filled front garden provides a lush green privacy screen and compliments the traditional heritage colours of this family weatherboard home. The full length front elevated verandah welcomes you into this home which features 4 bedrooms.
The Master has a walk in robe and an ensuite and is located at the other end of the home to the other 3 bedrooms. With 2 separate living areas there is space for all family members to enjoy and the gas ducted heating, slow combustion wood heater, two split systems and ceiling fans will ensure climate comfort all year round. The charming timber kitchen includes a large bay window to give you serene views of the gardens outside.
Relax under the gazebo or under the trees while listening to the native bird songs. With a large acreage backing onto this property, you can be assured of peace and tranquillity. The feature list continues with a substantial outdoor room/workshop/studio, landscaped paths and gardens, built in bbq, double carport with a high roof suitable for caravan storage, lock up garage with internal access, veggie garden, low maintenance bitumen driveway and storage shed.
This property must be inspected to be appreciated!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994

Description:
AT THIS PRICE, DONT THINK TWICE
On an elevated block surrounded by established trees and stunning ferns is this brick home perfectly suited to the growing family, first home buyer or investor looking for instant return.
The home offers a flexible floor plan with large master suite at the front of the home equipped with his and hers Built In Robes and full ensuite, second bedroom in close proximity to the master and ideal for the youngest child or home office. The remaining bedrooms are located at the rear of the home are serviced by the family bathroom and privately tucked away down their own hallway.
The kitchen is located at the center of the home and offers an abundance of bench space along with the convenience of a double oven, electric cook top, plenty of storage and overlooks the spacious dining area.
The main lounge provides enough space for the whole family to enjoy and comes complete with a cozy wood fire and the convenience of split system heating and cooling.
Outside you will find a covered entertaining patio, paved area and a beautiful tiered garden.
Located only minutes to the townships of Emerald and Cockatoo, walking distance to Emerald Secondary and renowned restaurant, this home ticks all the boxes.
Call today as inspections are a must!!
This property is a bonus with great tenants, leased until June 2019.

Description:
Privacy, Location and Fabulous Views!
This is an absolutely stunning property that will be sure to please even the fussiest of buyers! Perfect for executives, families, weekend retreat or B&B. This beautifully presented immaculate home situated on a low maintenance 1 acre block offers privacy with spectacular 180 degree views of lush rolling pastures and distant fields, yet only a 300 metre walk to the beautiful Gembrook Township and the lifestyle it has to offer including public transport, shops, cafes, restaurants and a short stroll to the Gembrook Primary School, Puffing Billy Station and the much loved Sunday market to name just a few. Or for lovers of nature, enjoy many of the beautiful walking paths close by.
This quality built split level home offers 3 separate, spacious living zones, 3 generous sized bedrooms with the master featuring large walk-through robe and ensuite with a spa bath. From the Master there is also an entry directly onto the indoor and outdoor casual living area. This elevated outdoor living area is fully enclosed with glass and café blinds to showcase the brilliant views and has its own imitation gas log fireplace which allows entertaining all year round.
High quality features throughout this home includes stunning Tassie Oak hardwood flooring, plush new carpets, vaulted ceilings, recently painted inside and out, gas ducted heating, faux gas log fires, ducted vacuum system, instantaneous gas hot water system and large windows providing picturesque views of the surrounding countryside. Youll love spending time and cooking up a storm in the well-appointed modern kitchen with its stone benchtops, 700mm x 680mm cooktop and double pantry. Smart design has created an open-plan kitchen/family room that extends through to the outdoor deck and covered entertaining area, providing the very best of indoor/outdoor living and entertaining.
The extensive asphalt drive way incorporates plenty of room for off-street parking for the caravan, trailer or boat and there is an additional under-house lock-up 2-car garage and storage area with internal dry access to the home through the downstairs entry foyer. You also have the convenience of a separate 6m x 6m colour bond garage providing more under-cover parking options, or workshop. With stunning landscaped gardens, veggie patches, established ornamental trees and large manicured lawn areas, there is something for families young and old alike.
Call to arrange your private inspection of this impressive property.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820

Description:
CUTE LOG CABIN ON A FLAT BLOCK
EASY DUAL ACCESS OFF UPPER GRIEVE ROAD! PLENTY OF PARKING! SEALED DRIVE AND DOUBLE GARAGE! PRIVATE!
Homely and welcoming log cabin with large open plan living with open fire place, 2 bedrooms and a study/3rd bedroom, spacious kitchen and good sized bathroom. Plenty of scope to add your own flair in this classic hills hide-a-away.
Located walking distance to Avonsleigh shop and the well regarded Bam Bam restaurant, halfway between Cockatoo & Emerald, and only an hour from Melbourne with sealed road access and close to public transport, this home is the one for you and is priced to sell! Description:
Space And A Location To Love
If you are over 55 and looking to downsize and still be close to all the conveniences that Emerald has to offer including cafes, shops, medical practitioners, public transport, Art Society, Community House and Emerald Lake Park, then this is the ideal home for you. Located in the popular Chestnuts Gardens this one bedroom unit has the largest block in the village.
This home includes a large bedroom with built in robes and is serviced by the main bathroom. Featuring a spacious lounge and meals area adjoining the gallery kitchen you will be able to enjoy preparing meals while looking onto your garden outside. Large windows allow plenty of natural light to filter through this home and provides views to the established north facing garden beds at the front. High secure fences ensure your privacy where you can relax outside with your furry friend or tend to your garden or veggie patch. The home has slab heating for comfort all year round, security entrance door, single lock up garage & secure access from the garage into the home.
This home will provide you with the opportunity to enjoy life doing the things that are important to you without the work of a property that has become too large. Also a great investment opportunity (rental for 55yo +). To arrange an inspection at your convenience, call today.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994
Please note: All property details shown are correct at time of publishing. Some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours and we recommend that you confirm open for inspection times with the listing agent direct or the listing office
